name: bafachat
description: A Discord alternative with Go backend and React frontend

scripts.dev: npm run services:start && concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.setup: npm run install:client && npm run install:server
scripts.db:start: sh -c "docker start bafachat-postgres >/dev/null 2>&1 || docker run --name bafachat-postgres -e POSTGRES_DB=bafachat -e POSTGRES_USER=postgres -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=postgres -p 5435:5432 -d postgres:16"
scripts.redis:start: sh -c "docker start bafachat-redis >/dev/null 2>&1 || docker run --name bafachat-redis -p 6379:6379 -d redis:7-alpine"
scripts.services:start: npm run db:start && npm run redis:start
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && cd client && rm -rf build node_modules && cd ../server && go clean

author: Your Name
